document.full_text: as libyan rebels fled in headlong retreat from the superior arms and tactics of muammar gaddafi's troops on wednesday, u.s. officials said president barack obama had signed a secret order authorizing covert support for the rebels.
document.title: libyan rebels flee as obama authorizes covert support
lines_and_colors: as libyan rebels fled in headlong retreat from the superior arms and tactics of muammar gaddafi's troops on wednesday, u.s. officials said president barack obama had signed a secret order authorizing covert support for the rebels.
